entry.title: New release for Huntarr: Time Fix
entry.content:
@Gykes made a minor time fix to prevent errors. Nothing breaking

What's Changed

  • Added github container registry in pipeline by @nath1416 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/355
  • Revert "Added github container registry in pipeline" by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/360
  • Import Time Bugfix by @Gykes in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/357

New Contributors

  • @nath1416 made their first contribution in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/355

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.2.23...6.2.24

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.3.0
entry.content:
6.3.0 - Released

  • Improved desktop and mobile view for users
  • 6.3.x will be released with hotfixes and minor updates
  • New Features/Major Changes will be released as 6.4beta-01
  • When 6.3.1 is released, it will feature a way to view the beta updates

Fixes from 6.2 to 6.3

Huntarr 6.2 > 6.3 Comprehensive Update Summary

  • UI/UX Enhancements:
  • Added clear "Version" and "Latest" indicators for mobile interfaces
  • Redesigned navigation buttons for improved mobile usability
  • Fixed responsive design issues causing awkward displays between desktop and mobile views
  • Implemented more intuitive interface elements for consistent cross-platform experience

  • Optimized layout for various screen sizes to eliminate display inconsistencies

  • New Functionality:

  • Added real-time countdown timer for sleep cycles in logs, providing better operational visibility
  • Implemented manual reset button on homepage, allowing users to trigger immediate app cycles without waiting
  • Enhanced logging system with more granular control over verbosity levels

  • Improved state tracking mechanisms for better resumption after restarts

  • Bug Remediation:

  • Fixed excessive log spamming for new users who don't use all supported apps
  • Resolved Readarr integration issues with invalid URL format on Author Refresh operations
  • Corrected time-related bugs that were causing intermittent system errors

  • Fixed several edge cases in app initialization that could cause startup problems

  • Performance Optimizations:

  • Prevented redundant logging when first app is enabled
  • Improved resource utilization during idle periods
  • Enhanced handling of API connections to reduce unnecessary calls

  • Optimized database operations for smoother performance with large libraries

  • Configuration Improvements:

  • Improved handling of disabled or unused apps to prevent unnecessary error messages
  • Streamlined first-time setup experience
  • Better default settings for new installations

  • More graceful handling of missing configuration elements

  • Infrastructure Updates:

  • Updated base container components for improved security and performance

  • Enhanced error handling for more resilient operation during network disruptions

  • Mobile Experience Focus:

  • Complete review and enhancement of mobile interface elements
  • Improved touch targets for better mobile interaction
  • Optimized information density for smaller screens without sacrificing functionality

  • Better responsive design across all interface elements

  • Operational Stability:

  • Multiple under-the-hood fixes to improve long-term running stability
  • Better handling of edge cases in API interactions
  • Enhanced recovery mechanisms for temporary connection issues
  • Improved logging for troubleshooting complex environments
